Name: Light-winged Dryad of the trees
Notes: A tribute to the Nightingale. Both instrumentalists can play, to a certain extent, independently of each other, providing a backdrop for the soprano.
Long Description: Ein Tribut an die Nachtigall. Beide Instrumentalisten können, innerhalb eines bestimmten Rahmens, unabhängig voneinander spielen, quasi als Klangkulisse für den Sopran. A tribute to the Nightingale. Both instrumentalists can play, to a certain extent, independently of each other, providing a backdrop for the soprano.
Short Description: A tribute to the Nightingale. Both instrumentalists can play, to a certain extent, independently of each other, providing a backdrop for the soprano.
